body.name: Galanz GLCMKA07GNR-07 Retro Microwave Oven, LED Lighting, Pull Handle Design, Child Lock, Surf Green, 0.7 cu ft
features: 700W With 6 Variable Power Level: Galanz 0.7 Cu.Ft, 700 Watts Microwave Oven With Lighting Pull Handle, Microwave Oven Offers Six Power Level To Cook. It Is Easy To Defrost

Defrost & Led Display: For All Your Frozen Foods, Defrost By Time Or Weight So You Can Enjoy More Flavorful Foods. Easy-To-Read Led Display Clearly Shows Remaining Cooking Time. And When The Cooking Procedure Have Finished, Three Beeps Sound Will Be Heard

360°Rotating Evenly Heating: 360° Heating And Rotation Of Glass Turntable During Operation Helps Cook Food More Evenly And Then Improves The Cooking Efficiency. So You Will Enjoy Fresh And Delicious Food Within A Short Time

Interior Light & Child Lock: Interior Light For Checking The Status Without Having To Open The Doors. The Safety Lock Prevents Unsupervised Operation By Children. Lock The Control Panel Using The Child Safety Lock Option To Prevent Accidental Use Or Access By Children

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Galanz 0.7 Cu.Ft Countertop Microwave makes cooking and reheating meals or beverages simple, quick, and convenient. With adjustable power levels, defrost program and weight adj./, this microwave oven offers a variety of choices to complete your cooking tasks. The fun Retro design brings a look and feel of the fabulous old days, adding style but still function in your modern kitchen. It is a fun and stylish addition to any kitchen, rec room, home office or dorm room. Color: Surf Green Watt: 700W Defrost, Weight ADJ./ ECO Kitchen Timer and Clock Interior Light Weight: 23.1 lbs Dimension: 17.9‘’ X 13.8‘’ X 10.3‘’ (W X D X H)

Adjustable Power Levels Adjustable power levels makes cooking and reheating meals or beverages simple, quick, and convenient. 9.6‘’ Glass Turntable 360° rotation of glass turntable helps food cook more evenly. Child Safety Lock Lock the control panel using the child safety lock option to prevent accidental use or access by children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dig the color and the retro look
reviews.reviewText: Got a Galanz blue mini fridge about 3 1/2 years ago when looking for a new full size fridge. They had a display of them on sale in the store so bought it basically on a whim cause we liked the design and color (had already started with the teal blue accent theme in the kitchen) just to have as an emergency back up/overflow/beer/soda fridge. It's worked great ever since. So when the microwave that we've had for over 20 years started acting up for months and seemed to be getting worse we decided to get a microwave to match the fridge. We had also got the Galanz toaster oven which has been working great, so now we have a nice matching set of small appliances. The microwave works great, is easy to operate and has more options than I need! It still fits a dinner size plate but is a little smaller than our old microwave and heats just as well as the old one. I'm a fan of the color and the retro look so we are very happy Galanz customers. Don't have the long term use to review with this yet (4 months) but so far all of our Galanz products have worked perfectly. Happy to recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Analog is the Best
reviews.reviewText: I love using the dial to set duration times. So easy. No more beep, beep, beep of a number pad. I also really appreciate that when your drink/food is ready it stops beeping when you open the door. Makes perfect sense.Also, the design touches on the side panels are much appreciated. Other manufacturers use ugly flat side panels to save money. This is a functional, well-designed microwave. Bravo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gives your kitchen, a nice retro flair!!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased the (Galantz,9 cu ft/modern, green color), from Amazon. The microwave was nicely packaged. (Didn't have any scratches, dents etc). We were soooo happy about that. It's a pretty microwave, with the WOW factor!!! It gives the kitchen a nice classy/retro flair. Believe me.... your friends/family will notice this microwave!!! We like that it has the time, rotary timer, and handle to open the door. The only thing with the microwave, is that the (ring), under the glass plate tends moves around. It's not a big issue. We just adjust it, as we use it. The other thing, is that you will need a silicone pad under this microwave, b/c it will shift/move as you open/close the door. We like all the programs it has for reheating/cooking etc. However, we only use microwaves to heat/reheat. We (never have, or never will) use a microwave to cook food. The max. time we use to heat/reheat is 2:30 minutes. We purchased this Galantz microwave over a month ago, and we absolutely love it!! Heads up.....the green color is more of a turquoise green. It's a very elegant color!!! We absolutely love it!!! No Regrets!! ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute Small Retro Microwave
reviews.reviewText: I recently moved into a new apartment and it was built in the 40s. The apartment is reasonably small but my kitchen is tiny and the outlet situation is a bit of a challenge. I bought a Toshiba microwave and realized quickt that it was muuuuch too big for the space. I returned it and decided to buy this retro aesthetic microwave instead. I was hesitant as it is only 700 watts and after reading reviews I wasn't sure if I was just paying for a pretty look rather than something that works well. Although, I haven't had it that long, she works wonderfully. I have to warn you that I do not do hardcore cooking with my microwave. I do use it to defrost, rather I use it for the lightweight reheats, microwave meals, and soups. I was worried that perhaps I would have to run it for several minutes more but that hasn't been the case. Sometimes I pop it in for an extra 30 seconds and it is fine. I have noticed slightly that there seems to be hot spots but for the most part, if the food is something I can stir then it makes the rest of the food hot and it hasn't been a problem. If you are short on space then this may just be a saving grace. It is wonderfully small although my fiestware 10 inch plate does fit snugly. It is beautiful and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice and works great. Had a little trouble with the lazy turntable, but otherwise it's fine. Price reasonable. Yes but again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional
reviews.reviewText: I got really tired of white microwaves turning an ugly yellow color over time, so decided to go with this retro green one. I was apprehensive about how difficult it might be to use after getting used to touch screens, but it's a breeze. I actually prefer the controls, let alone the look, over my old one. Extremely happy with this purchase. It's also very quiet, and the compact size fits perfectly in my little kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this microwave... bought both convection oven and it and am glad... beautiful color, large size and good quality..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Retro Design & Color!
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with the presentation. The green color is gorgeous and the design is a visual feast to see in the kitchen. I didn't know how this would work out, but it is a perfect fit in the space I have for it, matches the kitchen cabinetry hardware & compliments the old swirled green countertop in my 71 year old house. It also heats well and evenly and is easy to use. On the downside it is rickety & loud, the interior light is dim and feels cheaply made which is noticeable when you open and close the door or turn & push the knob to cook. If it lasts for a year, I will be amazed. I guess uncertain quality is the price you pay for decor and style. I love it and will be keeping it and hoping for the best over time.

reviews.reviewTitle: All were great. But I do not get to use them until I move.
reviews.reviewText: I will let you know when I open them and use them at a later date. Thanks.

Ya tengo rato usándolo y si salió bueno (dudaba un poco) es muy bonito el diseño, combina bien con mi casa y su funcionalidad es la de un horno de microondas como tal, buen espacio dentro del horno, cabe un plato extendido y las palomitas para micro sin problema todo al 1005 estrellas, excelente servicio

This small microwave exceeds all expectations. It fits perfectly in small places. The retro look is classic and it functions wonderfully. The one touch menu with adjustable power settings is easy to use as is simply turning the knob for the amount of time you need. I wanted a microwave with a pull handle because the last microwave I owned stopped working due to the fact the door wouldn’t open when I pushed the door. The glass turntable is 9.6” which is perfect for dinner plates. I bought this microwave on sale and the value is great. I would definitely recommend to anyone.
Perfect little microwave. Cute . Great value !
